subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Yankees effort to advance in the wild-card race suffered a demoralizing blow after Mariano Rivera allowed a tying run in the ninth, and Jacoby Ellsbury scored in the 10th.
snippet: The Yankees effort to advance in the wild-card race suffered a demoralizing blow after Mariano Rivera allowed a tying run in the ninth, and Jacoby Ellsbury scored in the 10th.
